item.title: Java SE 17
item.description: Thread 要執行Thread程式，最簡單的方式就是定義一個class繼承Runnable interface，並呼叫start()開始執行: package cc.openhome; public class Hare implements Runnable { private boolean[] flags = {true, false}; private int totalStep; private int step; public Hare(int totalStep) { this.
